resources.string: Your reservation has been successfully requested, please check your reservations section after a short period of time.
If payment is made and the order is confirmed, the money will not be refunded upon cancellation after 24 hours
Welcome to Assist Hub! These Terms govern your use of our app. By accessing or using Assist Hub, you agree to these Terms. If you disagree, please do not use the app

By using Assist Hub, you confirm that you have read and agreed to these Terms and our Privacy Policy. We may update these Terms at any time, with changes communicated through the app or your phone number. Continued use indicates your acceptance of the updates.

Users must be 18 or older, or have parental consent if under 18. Accurate information is required during account creation, and users are responsible for securing their credentials and account activities.

Assist Hub offers premium features via a subscription plan: \n\nSubscription fees for VIP users are billed annually, while casual users follow a standard payment process. The reservation system is a 12-hour reservation for the first shift and another 12 hours for the second shift (hotel reservation system). Payment for subscriptions will be all the amount upfront. If you cancel your subscription or reservation before 24 hours, the amount paid will be fully refunded after 72 hours.
By using Assist Hub, you agree to our Privacy Policy regarding data collection, storage, and use. Your data is never sold to third parties.
The app integrates with third-party platforms like Bazily, Nahao, and Kixc. By using these integrations, you agree to their respective terms and conditions.
